programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: The shelter is invited to the Dog Bowl, which provides an amazing opportunity for rescues to get adopted. A couple are looking to adopt their first dog

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Lucas Congdon revisits five of his favourite builds and families. He and his team reveal their never-before-seen, most outrageous backyard creations

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Lucas builds a giant pool for a friend. He creates a dream backyard with a dock, large cascading waterfalls, firepit and an audio-visual entertainment bar you can swim up to

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete Nelson heads to the Bella Rose plantation in Virginia, where he builds a luxurious Thomas Jefferson-inspired treehouse complete with colonial columns

programme.title: Wild Dubai
programme.desc: Behind modern Dubai lies a hidden treasure - an incredible wildlife that speaks of a timeless connection to the desert, the sea and the history and tradition of its people

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: How is one fish blowing scientists away with its brainpower? How have dogs learnt to melt our hearts? Do chimps laugh at the same jokes we do?

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: How does a fish make a weapon out of water? Why do turtles always return to the same beach to lay their eggs? Why do rhinos all poop in the same place?

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: Bradley and Billy are in the Mojave Desert, California, to find the bombardier beetle. When attacked or agitated, it releases a hot, noxious chemical spray

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: In the Madagascan rainforest, the team searches for a nearly invisible creature, the panther chameleon. When testing, the reptile seems to defy the laws of physics

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: When keepers notice a snow leopard is struggling to walk, he is taken to a veterinary neurologist for an MRI scan. Keepers feed an adorable penguin chick

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Brett and Wayde race against the clock to build Rapper and actor Ludacris a classy tank. He wants a sophisticated aquarium, complete with lots of exotic fish

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: Otto buries a giant water tank to solve a few shortage issues. Atz Lee and Atz Sr seek out a black bear, and Eivin builds a survival motorbike fitted with weapons

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: Lake Windsor on Inagua Island is home to a mystery. How did giant ocean-dwelling fish get there? The team aims to find out - and catch some bonefish

programme.title: Saved by the Barn
programme.desc: Dwight the cow is taken to Indiana to undergo hydrotherapy. Dan welcomes over a dozen exotic farm animals and Lola the goat is ready to walk again

programme.title: Mountain Monsters
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Red Shed
programme.desc: The hunters track down one of the mysterious cloaked figures at the heart of the Spearfinger mystery. However, the red shed might hold all the answers

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson helps a good cat stand up to its two feline attackers. He also meets a couple fed up with their cats eating everything in sight

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Denver pet doc Jeff Young treats a puppy suffering from a deadly virus, and he must gain the trust of rescued wolves to help an ailing member of the pack

programme.title: Extinct or Alive
programme.desc: Biologist Forrest Galante tries to prove the existence of animals thought to be gone for ever. He begins by tracking clues that suggest the Formosan clouded leopard, which was declared extinct only recently, could still be alive

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and M2 prepare a pitbull for its forever home, only for the adoption to take an unexpected turn. A new parolee comes to Villalobos from Boston

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Documentary following award-winning pool designer Lucas Congdon as he turns high and dry homes into exotic waterfront properties through grand, nature-inspired designs to encourage his clients to rediscover their love of the outdoors. The crew turns a koi pond project into a backyard oasis for a family in Siesta Key, and later transforms an old pool into a natural lagoon

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Lucas is in Utah to build a dream backyard on the side of a mountain. He creates a Tuscan-themed pool with a spa, a huge linear fire wall and a grotto

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr Jeff and his team help a dog that was lost during a windstorm. Dr Baier treats a small bird with a big personality and Susan rescues an abandoned paralysed dog

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Mel and her daughter rescue a baby squirrel. Dr Jeff helps a dog with a serious illness, and then teams up with Dr Petra to save a beloved cat hit by a car

programme.title: Extinct or Alive
programme.desc: Biologist Forrest Galante is in the Faroe Islands looking for a trace of the great auk, a large flightless seabird that was declared extinct more than 175 years ago

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete Nelson and the team build a charming treehouse in the style of a rustic river shack along the banks of the Mississippi

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: After coming closer than ever to proving the existence of Bigfoot in Oregon, the team continues their search in the mountains of Kentucky

programme.title: Bear Vs Shark
programme.desc: Bear Grylls has survived the most extreme environments, but what happens when he goes head to head with sharks when they have the home-field advantage?

programme.title: Weird, True and Freaky: Real Monsters
programme.desc: Top 10 countdown of the most ferocious attacks by the natural worlds scariest predators, from dagger-toothed cats and slithering serpents to stealth sea assassins

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: As baby Grace discovers the world, Robert attempts the biggest Gator move in Australia Zoo history. Meanwhile, Terri helps the Sumatran Elephants

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Serious complications arise after the birth of Talbert the giraffe. Plus, Robert rescues an entangled swan caught in a fishing line

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.sub-title: The Age of the Steam Locomotive
programme.desc: The revolution in transport brought about by steam power, charting the technologys development from the earliest colliery railways, through the first passenger train services and to the end of an era in the 1960s

programme.title: Pubs, Ponds and Power: The Story of the Village
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson explores the history of the Northumberland village of Warkworth. With the help of locals he discovers clues that point back almost 1,000 years to the Norman conquest, revealing how the invaders laid the foundations of a planned community still visible to this day

programme.title: Inside Classical
programme.desc: Owain Wyn Evans presents as the BBC National Orchestra of Wales perform some spooky film favourites, including John Williams scores to Harry Potter, Jaws and E.T. Plus, some classical gothic music by Bach, Saint-Saëns and Korsakov

programme.title: Man Alive
programme.desc: Speaking to couples who have chosen not to take the traditional route towards marriage, some have been previously married and are unable to obtain the divorces they need while others see it as an outdated concept, to discover the effects on their children and how society views couples who are living in sin. First broadcast in 1966

programme.title: Man Alive
programme.desc: Reporter Gillian Strickland follows a typical office as they prepare for their annual party, the spree itself and the aftermath. First broadcast in 1970

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.desc: JK Galbraith examines the First World War as an instrument in changing the old social order, and especially Lenin, who spent most of the war exiled in Switzerland urging soldiers to start a world revolution. First broadcast in 1977

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.sub-title: The Rise and Fall of Money
programme.desc: John Kenneth Galbraith looks at the history of economic thinking and the problems in industrial society that are factors in it

programme.title: Pubs, Ponds and Power: The Story of the Village

programme.title: Inside Classical
programme.desc: Owain Wyn Evans presents as the BBC National Orchestra of Wales perform some spooky film favourites, including John Williams scores to Harry Potter, Jaws and E.T. Plus, some classical gothic music by Bach, Saint-Saëns and Korsakov

programme.title: Earths Seasonal Secrets
programme.desc: The last in a set of four documentaries exploring wildlife and plants throughout the year focuses on the spring, when hibernating animals awake and many species search for mates. The programme features footage of grizzly bear cubs, the mating dances of grebes, flowers growing in the desert and swifts embarking on marathon journeys

programme.title: Stolen: Catching the Art Thieves
programme.desc: A look at the police investigation into the theft of Edvard Munch paintings The Scream and Madonna from Oslos Munch Museum in June 2004, which revealed the lengths criminals will go to gain a get-out-of-jail card for murder

programme.title: Call My Bluff
programme.desc: Angela Rippon, Nerys Hughes, Peter Brough and Jonathan Miller join team captains Frank Muir and Patrick Campbell for the panel game of word definitions and deceptions. Robert Robinson hosts

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against Patricia Owen, John Julius Norwich and David Attenborough. With guest musician David Willcocks

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: A 1981 film telling the story of the famed New York hotel, which has served as a home for artists, writers and musicians including Mark Twain, Arthur C Clarke, William S Burroughs, Leonard Cohen, Sid Vicious and Bob Dylan

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: David Warner narrates a 1984 profile of the artist, focusing on his life, his lovers and his artistic works and pursuits

programme.title: The Great Philosophers
programme.desc: The works of German thinker Immanuel Kant, whose Critique of Pure Reason is considered one of the most influential works in western philosophy

programme.title: The Great Philosophers
programme.desc: Acclaimed Australian academic Peter Stringer discusses the works of German philosophers GWF Hegel and Karl Marx

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against Patricia Owen, John Julius Norwich and David Attenborough. With guest musician David Willcocks

The programme features footage of grizzly bear cubs, the mating dances of grebes, flowers growing in the desert and swifts embarking on marathon journeys

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Liverpool v Aston Villa at Anfield and Tottenham Hotspur v Chelsea at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. Champions Liverpool claimed a 2-0 home win over the Villans last term, while the Blues claimed a memorable 4-3 victory over Spurs in the corresponding fixture 11 months ago. Plus, Brighton and Hove Albion v Leeds United, Burnley v Arsenal, Crystal Palace v Brentford, Fulham v Wolverhampton Wanderers and Nottingham Forest v Manchester United

programme.title: Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg
programme.desc: Interviews with key politicians and public figures

programme.title: Weather Watchers with Barra Best
programme.desc: The weather presenter and journalist examines how climate shapes everyones lives and looks at the activities that it enables people to participate in

programme.title: Sunday Morning Live
programme.desc: Sean Fletcher and Mehreen Baig present topical debate covering religious, moral and ethical issues, with guest panellists and contributions from viewers

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.desc: The musical Friday evening service from Nottingham Liberal Synagogue, which is part of the Progressive Judaism movement. The inclusive service, led by Rabbi Gili Zidkiyahu alongside co-Rabbi Josh Levy, welcomes all members of the community together to usher in the Sabbath

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Charlie Ross presents the show from Kings Lynn on the north Norfolk coast, with experts Raj Bisram and Stephanie Connell assisting the teams. Charlie also visits the North Sea coast to discover how a devastating flood led to a safer Britain

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: On All Souls Day, the Rev Kate Bottley explores faith, grief and bereavement with Christians in the Midlands and visits a bereavement-friendly church

programme.title: Points of View
programme.desc: Viewers opinions on BBC shows and behind-the-scenes reports on new programmes

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Wildlife that live thousands of kilometres from land, featuring footage of baby turtles using debris as life rafts and whales sharks embarking on lengthy voyages across the Pacific to the point where it is safest to give birth. Special pressure-proof cameras are used to film sperm whales hunting for squid a kilometre beneath the surface and the impact of plastic pollution on the oceans is revealed

programme.title: Hamzas Hidden Wild Isles
programme.desc: In Autumn, Hamza heads to the south Devon coast to spot Atlantic bluefin tuna, and pays a night-time visit to Londons Highgate Cemetery in search of urban foxes. He also explores a cave system in Northern Ireland, where experts have discovered a hidden species of cave spiders and a fungus that turns the underground arachnids into zombies

programme.title: Coco
programme.desc: A Mexican boy longs to be a guitarist, despite his family hating music. During the Day of the Dead festivities, he gets transported to the land of the dead, and with the help of a cunning skeleton, hopes to find his ancestor and learn the secrets of his familys history. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Anthony Gonzalez and Gael Garcia Bernal

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest forecast

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Charlotte Smith and John Craven explore Wiltshires woodlands, meeting the people who work to protect them, including foresters, conservationists, artists and ecologists, and going in search of one of Britains most elusive mammals - the dormouse. John meets volunteers working on the Kennet and Avon Canal, while Adam Henson takes part in an annual sheep drive in Bedfordshire

programme.title: Hamzas Hidden Wild Isles
programme.desc: Hamza Yassin reveals hidden wildlife gems to be found in winter, travelling from the frozen Highlands of Scotland down to the quiet suburbs of Sussex. He goes in search of a bird that turns white to blend in with the snow and wild boars that have returned to Britains forests for the first time in 700 years, and climbs a three-metre-tall scaffold tower to get footage of wild tawny owls

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: The frights keep coming on Strictlys Halloween weekend as the couples find out the results. The professionals invite viewers to a Monsters Ball and theres music by Cat Burns. As the witching hour approaches, two more couples will be sent down into the dreaded dance off and for one, the die is cast. Who will be banished from the ballroom for good?

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.sub-title: Hill of Tarvit Mansion and Garden 2
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the show from Hill of Tarvit Mansion and Garden, Fife. Finds include a futuristic chair that has appeared on several sci-fi TV series, an unusual solid silver table decoration from Australia, an embroidered map of the world, and a jug made by Picasso. Fiona is challenged to tell real gems from synthetic ones, and plays a round of hickory golf

programme.title: Riot Women
programme.desc: After six weeks at Beths house, a happy, healthy Kittys world shifts when she runs into her abusive ex-boyfriend and SpongeBob brings news of her elusive gangland father. Nisha is backed into a brutal corner at work, and instead of the bland pop song theyve practised, the Riot Women decide to sing a much more incendiary song, one that Beth and Kitty wrote last week

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, featuring West Ham United v Newcastle United at London Stadium and Manchester City v Bournemouth at Etihad Stadium. Newcastle claimed a 1-0 win away to the Hammers last term, but the Londoners will hope to fare better under the stewardship of Nuno Espírito Santo. The Citizens prevailed 3-1 over Bournemouth in last seasons corresponding fixture, but the Cherries are enjoying an excellent campaign so far this time around

programme.title: The Womens Football Show
programme.desc: Highlights of the weekends matches in the Super League, including Chelsea v London City Lionesses and Brighton and Hove Albion v Manchester United

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The host is joined by double Oscar nominee Keira Knightley, now turned childrens author with I Love You Just the Same. Plus, female education activist Malala Yousafzai talks about her new memoir Finding My Way, Aimee Lou Wood reflects on her role in BBC comedy series Daddy Issues and comedian Chris McCausland recounts his journey from comic to Strictly winner in Keep Laughing.Theres music from Mumford and Sons with Hozier, who perform their new single Rubber Band Man

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Helen Skelton host the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Caught
programme.desc: When police arrive at a fatal collision, they must establish if its an accident or deadly driving. Plus, officers in Durham deal with the tragic aftermath of a drunk driver

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martel Maxwell is in St Helens, Merseyside to view a three-bedroom mid-terrace with ominous signs of damp. She also heads to a rural part of West Lothian in Scotland to visit a four-bedroom detached house that has seen better days, but has the potential to be a beautiful family home. Martin Roberts is in Launceston, Cornwall, where a one-bedroom flat with a wonderful view but a short lease is on offer

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Lesley Kiddell-Spencer and Colin Young assist the teams in Oswestry, while in Manchester, Caroline Hawley visits an Aladdins cave of fabric swatches dating back to the late 1700s

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.desc: Ethical hackers to hunt down cyber criminals. Scammers pretending to be from Sky broadband and claiming there are problems with her internet have got into one womans phone and are just seconds away from helping themselves to her money

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: The team sets out to help a teacher who lost her phone and precious wedding rings. Social media detective Mui is hunting for the owner of a camera lost in a lake for over 10 years

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton helps a couple to find a home in north Somerset where they can start a family. He also learns about the art of inner calm on a trip to the Somerset Levels

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: Chris Hull and Amelia Bouquet transform a bland and unsafe patch in Barnsley into a boho-style garden influenced by the owners love of upcycling, crafting and all things rustic

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret amount, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz in which contestants try to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious correct answers to questions. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Phil Wang

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: Hope Street
programme.desc: When a local head teacher is threatened, new boy Donal takes charge of the investigation - and Chloe worries that her secret boyfriend is the culprit. Lois spots Luke with a woman and warns Eve to take care of her marriage, leaving Eve wondering if he is having an affair. Lois has problems of her own as she faces a health scare. Elsewhere, Clint refuses to give Brandi her job back, so Nicole concocts a cunning plan. Tara Lynne ONeill stars

programme.title: If Walls Could Talk
programme.desc: In East Belfast, Templemore Baths stands as the last remaining Victorian public baths in Ireland and continues to serve the community today, bridging past and present

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Kat does her best to support Zoe, Eve is nervous as she and Suki welcome Eves mum, Norma, to Walford, and when Phil returns to Albert Square he is furious to learn about Nigels situation

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.desc: The team tackle scammers posing as the UKs National Crime Agency to scare targets into believing they will be arrested if they dont prove their identity by giving them money. These scammers even spoof the numbers of genuine police stations and use props to make their targets believe they face arrest if they dont comply

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Grace and Sean are under serious threat, while Lindsays testimony exposes the Ginleys. Colly takes a risk to go after Morgan, and Fogerty decides Tina is no longer useful

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Report on how a handful of wealthy individuals, including Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg and OpenAIs Sam Altman, have altered political reality, and how an exploration of their influence provides a unique means of making sense of Donald Trumps second administration and beyond

programme.title: Have I Got News for You
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts, as Labour MP Louise Haigh and comedian Laura Smyth join in the fun on the satirical current affairs quiz alongside regular team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton. As usual, all concerned poke fun at the weeks headlines

programme.title: Tell Me Lies
programme.sub-title: You Got a Reaction, Didnt You?
programme.desc: Lucy returns to Baird College for her second year hoping to put the mistakes of the past behind her

programme.title: Tell Me Lies
programme.sub-title: I Shall Now Perform a 180 Flip-Flop
programme.desc: Brees birthday takes an unexpected turn and Lucy is excited to focus on someone new

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: As the locals prepare for quiz night at the Vic, Kat wrestles with a decision as a discovery weighs heavily on her. Julie helps George see a situation from a different perspective, and Ross confides in Alfie

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Quiz night in the Vic ends abruptly as everyone reels from Kats bombshell. When she realises Zoes actions are impacting her business and family, she gives her daughter an ultimatum. Meanwhile, Suki and Eve take a positive step, and Oscar turns detective

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Halloween is off to a bad start for Alfie when the burst sewer pipe leaks in the barrel store, but as he cleans up, Alfie discovers a VHS tape from 1980s. Meanwhile, Anthony steps in to defuse a situation, and Eve faces a new hurdle

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: As Halloween night continues, Zoe grows increasingly paranoid that someone is out to get her and accuses Anthony before kicking him out of the Vic. And questions of the past come to the fore as Kat, Zoe and Tommy watch the video from 1988

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As morning breaks, breakfast proves to be a wake-up call for the faithful as the traitors strike again. Bridges need to be built if the celebrity players hope to add money to the prize fund, but with protection from murder on offer, some may be more interested in looking after number one. At the round table, suspicions continue to rise. Can the traitors deflect accusations, or will the faithful see through their lies? Presented by Claudia Winkleman

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the game nears the end, the murders become increasingly harder for the traitors. With time running out to increase the final prize pot, the celebrity players take on a mission where one mistake could cause heads to roll. At the round table, the faithful have one final chance to discover the identity of the banished player. Hosted by Claudia Winkleman

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined once again by series one Traitor Wilf and series three Traitor Minah, as well as the latest murdered and banished players. There is all the latest analysis, gossip and predictions from episode seven

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by series three winner Jake, and they are accompanied on the sofa by the latest banished and murdered players from the game

programme.title: The Woman in Black
programme.desc: A lawyer tormented by the death of his wife is sent to a remote village to put deceased client Alice Drablows affairs in order. The locals are suspicious of outsiders and determined to keep the areas tragic history a secret, and the late Mrs Drablows isolated house appears to be haunted by a vengeful spirit that seems hell-bent on redressing a decades-past grievance. Horror based on Susan Hills novel, with Daniel Radcliffe and Ciaran Hinds

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestone
programme.desc: Radio presenter Sian Eleri investigates the paranormal activity at Penyffordd Farm in north Wales, the house being widely considered the most haunted house in Britain in the late 1990s. She begins by meeting with specialist psychologist Dr Daniels who was called in by the family living on the farm at the time when they became desperate for answers for the strange activity in their home. The doctor explains that of the many apparently paranormal cases of his career, this was the one that stayed with him and still perplexes him to this day

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: Part one of two. After a video featuring a female prison officer and an inmate having sex inside HMP Wandsworth goes viral, journalist Mobeen Azhar begins an investigation into what happened and why. A year of twists, turns and damning revelations pulls back the curtain on a dangerous wider world of coercion, corruption and contraband thriving behind bars

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Sian Eleri recounts the story of Helen Duncan, who claimed she could summon the dead. Helen was a Scottish medium, who in 1944 went on trail at the Old Bailey and became the last person convicted and imprisoned under the Witchcraft Act. Sian visits Helens birthplace, Callander, a small town where her childhood premonitions caused fear in the community

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Disturbed by a recording of what appears to be a spirit voice and accounts of the late medium Helen Duncan summoning physical spirit forms, Sian Eleri focuses on evidence from those who believe this apparent seance to be fake. Searching for answers and hoping to understand how Helen was convincing people they were communicating with their dead loved ones, Sian tracks down a modern-day medium. He claims to commune with the other side, but a seance in Edinburgh leaves Sian with more questions than she first started with

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Alex Scott joins Rattus for a sport-themed special. Mary Queen of Scots goes grief-golfing, the H2 Freestylers take on a whole village, and sports-mad Henry VIII sings Get Sweaty

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: The Puritans set sail, Queen Elizabeth I loses a colony, and the Founding Fathers sing

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson tries out the Lotus T125, which brings F1-style performance to the track, and an updated version of the classic Jensen Interceptor. Bob Geldof gets behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car, and the trio employ all manner of second-hand military equipment to knock down a row of derelict houses, aiming to complete the job in less time than a team of demolition experts

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Journalist Tir Dhondy investigates the disappearance of Sarm Heslop, who went missing from a luxury Caribbean charter yacht in 2021. Tire retraces Sarms last known movements and tracks down two boat captains whose vessels were moored near the yacht she vanished from. Also, she gets to question Ryan Banes, Sarms boyfriend, account of what happened what happened through his lawyer David Cattie

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from, and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: Artist Anthony McCoy and his art gallery director girlfriend Brianna move into the heavily gentrified Cabrini Green neighbourhood of Chicago, where the urban legend of the Candyman once struck fear into residents hearts. For his provocative new exhibition, Anthony plunders the old legend. Sequel to the 1992 horror movie, starring Yahya Abdul-Mateen II and Vanessa Williams

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson tries out the Lotus T125, which brings F1-style performance to the track, and an updated version of the classic Jensen Interceptor. Bob Geldof gets behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car, and the trio employ all manner of second-hand military equipment to knock down a row of derelict houses, aiming to complete the job in less time than a team of demolition experts

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Sarah Keyworth hosts, as second heat contenders Eli Hart, Farhan Solo, Chloe Reynolds, Will BF and Monica Hsueh take to the stage of Birminghams Hockley Social Club in a bid to book their place in the final. Head judge Fatiha El-Ghorri is joined in her ranks by comedian, writer and podcaster Aurie Styla and local Brum stand-up Lindsey Santoro

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Alexandra Palace in north London, venue of the BBCs first ever television broadcast, stages the south of England heat, as comics Blank Peng, Fab Goualin, Sharifa Butterfly, Sydney May and Evaldas Karosas battle it out to book their place in this years grand final showdown. Host Sara Pascoe is joined by stand-up comics Catherine Bohart and Michael Odewale, who appear alongside Fatiha El-Ghorri on the panel of judges

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mobeen Azhars investigation into prison corruption uncovers the murder of a former officer who had been involved in exposing an illicit relationship. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Sian finds a medium in the Netherlands who claims they bring back spirits in physical form. This could be a glimpse into Helens world, but Sians been warned there are dangers. Back in the UK, Sian reads an astonishing account of Helen bringing back a Second World War sailor from the dead in Portsmouth

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Sian discovers an account of a spirit revealing secret information during a seance. This new evidence could prove Helens abilities - or that she was a spy. Either way, it seems the authorities wanted her out of the way because she was seen as a danger

programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring everything Duggee has grown in his vegetable garden, especially his crop of giant carrots, when they hear a noise. They investigate and find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice, the day when the sun is at its highest. On this day, they gather round Carrot Henge to celebrate the glory of this humble vegetable. Trouble is, the Rabbits need to go and get ready - but who will look after the carrots? The Squirrels volunteer, so off the Rabbits go. Looking after the carrots seems easy at first, and Norrie arranges tasks for everyone. Betty skillfully organises the queue while Roly is on toilet duty. And then, disaster strikes. Worm pops up and eats part of Carrot Henge. Duggee is dispatched to fetch one of his own giant carrots to fill the gap. As time ticks on with no Duggee in sight, the place gets busier, and the sun is nearly at the top. Will Duggee fix the Henge in time, or will Carrot Solstice be ruined?

programme.title: The Game Catchers

programme.title: Timmy Time

programme.title: Our Family

Its not long before they have their first mission: to rescue a toy thats become lost in the woods. But will the heroes find the toy and save the day?

The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dees friend finally succeeds in saying todays word!

programme.desc: Xand Van Tulleken and historian Tracy Borman examine the plot to kill James I by blowing up the House of Lords when the king would be present for the State Opening of Parliament. They follow Robert Catesby and his co-conspirators as they assemble their gang to carry out the attack, revealing just how dangerous it was to smuggle two and a half tons of gunpowder beneath the House of Lords, and show how the assassination of so many people in Parliament was meant to be the beginning of an audacious coup to take over the country

When glamorous duo Shan and Lauren turn up, Pippa witnesses the beginnings of a beautiful bromance between the men. Romance is in no short supply with the final couple, South Africans Jared and Ian. programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for Bridgeport, Connecticut, to visit Cafe Tavolini, which is being neglected by husband and wife managers teetering on the edge of divorce. The estranged couples two children are struggling to save the business from their parents disputes, and the visiting chef tries to shock the pair into stopping the restaurant from becoming a casualty of their quarrel

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to New Orleans to visit Zekes, a much-loved restaurant that has seen standards slip since the original owner died. The new proprietors, husband and wife duo Darryl and Ellen Cortello, focused all the efforts on the financial side of things, so it is up to Gordon to show them that they first need to love food to make any profit

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In Cedar Creek, a small, rural town in Texas, Gordon tries to help the owners of Leos Italian Grill rediscover their dream of a vibrant restaurant. After his son died, Leos passion faded, leading to poor food quality and service. Gordon sets out to re-ignite and partner Michelles love for the business and restore the restaurant to its former glory

programme.title: Taskmaster Bleeped
programme.desc: No-naughty-bits version. Little Alex Horne has a lot of fun administering a task involving ducks and mystery. But while that may be his favourite sort of task, its not appreciated by everyone, especially Sanjeev Bhaskar. Ania Magliano makes a noise like a small cat, Maisie Adam becomes smug and Reece Shearsmith balances on one leg for an impressive length of time, while Phil Ellis struggles to open a door. Greg Davies uses all his skills to judge a series of pictures of animals on top of animals

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.sub-title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown: Best Bits
programme.desc: Host Jimmy Carr and regular contributor Jon Richardson are joined by a host of top comedians for a compilation of best bits from the show, including Lee Mack, Sarah Millican, Alan Carr, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Ryan, Tom Allen, Judi Love, Nick Mohammed, Jonathan Ross, Rose Matafeo and Sam Campbell, along with regulars Joe Wilkinson, Susie Dent and Rachel Riley

programme.title: Greg Davies: Firing Cheeseballs at a Dog
programme.desc: Comedian Greg Daviess hugely successful and acclaimed debut stand-up show from 2011, in which he sets out to chronicle the significant issues surrounding modern life in his own irreverent style. A hit at the Edinburgh Festival, it was nominated for the Edinburgh Comedy Award before going on a sell-out, UK-wide tour

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Teams captains Jon Richardson and Sean Lock are joined by guests Louie Spence, Joe Wilkinson, Elis James and Shappi Khorsandi, who answer questions based on opinion polls carried out around the country to see who best understands what is going on in Britain today. Irreverent panel show hosted by Jimmy Carr

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys work on the tills at a burger restaurant before taking their fun to a department store. Later, the loser faces his fears in a terrifying elevator ride

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys try to humiliate one another at a convenience store before visiting a wedding expo. Later, the loser must face his childhood crush

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys are less than silent in a library, and hunt for their imaginary wives again at the mall, while two of them dress up as ice-hockey goaltenders and block shots from former New Jersey Devils players

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys hit the ice rink to play a slippery balloon game and try to get support for ridiculous causes at the park

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The pranksters gatecrash a gallery opening, where their antics are not appreciated, and also pass bizarre judgment on unsuspecting grocery shoppers

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys freeze out skaters at an ice rinks rental counter and then head to a mall, where they have the audacity to ask strangers to mind their manners

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: With Geoffrey away on spring break, Erica heads to Hollywood to see best friend Lainey. Adam is invited to join the cool kids poker night

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica returns from spring break intent on finding out where she stands with Geoff, while Adams plan to get Dave Kim a date for senior prom backfires

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted goes on a date and surprises his friends by not researching the woman on the internet beforehand, while Lily and Marshall learn the sex of their baby. Comedy, starring Josh Radnor, Alyson Hannigan and Jason Segel

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney and Noras romantic evening is ruined by a series of chaotic events, and the gang realises everyones partners bear some resemblance to their parents. Comedy, starring Josh Radnor

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants he helped that were among the biggest challenges he faced, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or turned back into nightmares. First he meets sisters Rita and Lisa to see if they have continued serving fresh instead of frozen food at Bostons La Galleria 33, before heading to the Olde Hitching Post in Hanson, Massachusetts, to discover whether controlling owner Tom has kept his promise and handed over the reins to his daughter Andrea. Finally, Gordon goes back to the Prohibition gastro pub in Everett, Washington, to catch up with owner Rishi and learn if she has ditched belly-dancing in favour of running her business

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Berkshire compete to host the best dinner party and walk away with the cash prize of £1,000, with Julian and Lesley, who prepare a meat-heavy menu, Tash and Rob, whose healthy meal has an unwelcome ingredient in the dessert, and Chris and Amanda, who recite their wedding vows during the evening

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Reading compete to host the best dinner party. Upstanding couple Liz and David kick off the competition with a menu replicating the first food they ever cooked together. However, prank-loving guests Jo and Steve take centre stage as talk around the table turns a bit `alternative". On fashion models Franky and Charlis night, Liz proves to be the wildcard as she reveals how much shes researched their online portfolios. On the final night, Jo cannot stomach whats on her and Steves own menu. However, it remains to be seen who will walk away with the cash prize of £1,000

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Space enthusiast Anthony is given full responsibility for organising his and fashion-conscious fiancee Hollys wedding, with a budget of £12,000 and a time constraint of three weeks. Hollys original plan to have an elegant Italian-style event hit the buffers, so Anthony is under more pressure than ever to provide something to please her

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.sub-title: Dont Tell the Bride - Best Ever
programme.desc: Radio 1 DJ Scott Mills counts down the top 10 editions of the series, as voted for by viewers. In the running for the number one spot are a groom obsessed with sci-fi, a man who gambled on a Vegas wedding and a couples WAG-style ceremony

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Ashley and Brandon Wright, the co-owners of Hamburger Marys, go incognito in their own company, hoping to ensure that their culture of diversity and acceptance is maintained as the business expands. Ashley goes undercover to appear with drag performer Jayla at a brunch show, and Brandon works a shift with bar manager Melissa, who feels underappreciated after eight years of hard work

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants he helped that were among the biggest challenges he faced, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or turned back into nightmares. First he meets sisters Rita and Lisa to see if they have continued serving fresh instead of frozen food at Bostons La Galleria 33, before heading to the Olde Hitching Post in Hanson, Massachusetts, to discover whether controlling owner Tom has kept his promise and handed over the reins to his daughter Andrea. Finally, Gordon goes back to the Prohibition gastro pub in Everett, Washington, to catch up with owner Rishi and learn if she has ditched belly-dancing in favour of running her business

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares Australia
programme.desc: Brand New - Chef Colin Fassnidge goes to the country and finds bad attitudes and even worse food at the American diner from hell. Its time to serve up a reality check

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In the concluding part of his trip to the Mill Street Bistro in Norwalk, Ohio, Gordons disagreement with proprietor Joe Nagy erupts into one of his most intense confrontations yet. Just when it looks like he has turned the corner and is ready to accept help, Joe slips back into his old ways, denying his own failings and picking petty fights. Can Gordon get this stubborn owner to finally accept his advice and secure the future of his restaurant?

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Crewe compete for the cash prize of £1,000. Natalie and her patriotic husband Tomo are hosting their first ever dinner party, hoping to impress seasoned socialites Roly and Claire. Meanwhile, the contests youngest couple, Helen and her boyfriend Deepe, keep a close eye on the levels of technical skill in the cooking. Next up, Roly and Claire put their well-practised dinner party skills to the test, expecting their adventurous ice-cream starter to go down well. Finally, foodies Deepe and Helen attempt an Indian menu full of home-made elements

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends struggle through an awkward morning after Sheldons mother and Leonards father share an evening together. Pennys family arrives in town to attend Penny and Leonards second wedding ceremony. Keith Carradine, Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard has a meeting with Colonel Williams, a representative from the US air forces department of material command, about the gyroscope he invented with Leonard and Sheldon. Penny accidentally reveals that Bernadette is pregnant to their colleagues at work. Dean Norris guest stars

programme.title: Taskmaster Bleeped
programme.desc: John Kearns does some elaborate skipping, Munya Chawawa does some elaborate jumping, and Fern Brady walks too slowly. Amid the carnage, Little Alex Horne attempts to offer sound advice to all five competitors, but finds himself largely ignored. Hosted by Greg Davies

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts as Sean Lock and Harriet Kemsley take on Jon Richardson and Chris McCausland in the words-and-numbers quiz. Nick Helm joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while maths whizz Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares Australia

programme.title: Friday Night Dinner
programme.desc: Jonny claims to have dislocated his shoulder to get out of helping clean out the loft. Adam discovers hes lying and threatens to tell their mum - until his brother responds by promising to tell her about his blind date with Hayley Posner. Meanwhile, the boys parents are not on speaking terms after an argument, with Dad revealing only that it is about something sexual

programme.title: Friday Night Dinner
programme.desc: Mum has put Dad on a diet for two weeks, but he makes the boys smuggle in food for him - which he keeps hidden in the downstairs toilet. Later, returning from a spin in Jonnys new - and very uncool - company car, the family members find something awful has happened to their house. Comedy, starring Paul Ritter and Tamsin Greig

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr is joined by captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson for highlights from the latest series of the comedy panel show. A host of well-known faces make up the teams as they discuss the topical events that set the publics chins wagging

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts as Sean Lock and Harriet Kemsley take on Jon Richardson and Chris McCausland in the words-and-numbers quiz. Nick Helm joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while maths whizz Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: As the village reels from an explosive week, residents face emotional fallout - with hearts broken, loyalties tested and unlikely alliances formed. With the truth finally out, and his past caught up to him, Donnys consumed by guilt and plans to flee Hollyoaks. Meanwhile, the teens return to the village, but worries and hidden secrets cause tensions. Billy Corkhill discovers that Hollyoaks has more in common with Brookside Close than he thought. As the hospital faces an intruder alert, heartbreak follows in the mortuary - and a residents confession takes a shocking turn

programme.title: Hollyoaks Unwrapped
programme.desc: Actor Kieron Richardson gives viewers a behind-the-scenes look at the soap, with guests Nadine Mulkerrin, Anna Passey and Anya Lawrence

programme.title: Celebrity Come Dine with Me
programme.sub-title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine With Me
programme.desc: To celebrate 30 years of the soap, Hollyoaks stars Isabelle Smith, Anya Lawrence, Charlie Wernham, James Redmond and Nicole Barber-Lane take it in turns to throw a dinner party. The first host, McQueen matriarch Nicole, is hoping that her tropical-themed evening will transport her guests to paradise. Izzy discovers Nicoles didgeridoo, while Anya reveals the pitfalls of kissing her on-screen co-stars

programme.title: Celebrity Come Dine with Me

programme.sub-title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine With Me

programme.sub-title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine With Me

programme.sub-title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine With Me

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Alison Hammond and Noel Fielding present as the semi-finalists take on patisserie week, serving up cream horns and tackling a recipe for a sugar glass dome in the technical round. In the showstopper, they produce a macaron sculpture that depicts something meaningful to them, before judges Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood decide who will be going through to the final

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: An unexpected arrival at the countryside retreat leads to a showdown. Also, as one marital breakdown continues to spiral, the group are caught in the crossfire at an explosive dinner party

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The group return from the retreat and head straight to the sofa for the latest Commitment Ceremony. Some couples reap the rewards from their time away, but for others turmoil continues to grow. Departures loom, and one emotional bride questions whether her marriage is beyond repair

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: While absence makes one grooms heart grow especially fonder, time apart reveals troubling fault lines in other marriages, testing one couples relationship to the brink of destruction

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The couples gather for their sixth dinner party, and while one groom cant wait to share his romantic realisation, others have less cause to celebrate

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: A secret agent branded a traitor tries to clear his name, with the aid of a socially awkward inventor he had fired for only developing non-lethal gadgets. The scientists latest invention gets out of control and transforms the spy into a pigeon - giving him the perfect disguise to prove his innocence. Animated adventure, with the voices of Will Smith, Tom Holland and Karen Gillan

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Noel Fielding and Alison Hammond host as soap stars past and present Chris Bisson, Natalie Cassidy, Dean Gaffney, Shobna Gulati and Sheree Murphy put their own spin on a traditional yule log, test their meringue skills and create their favourite storyline in biscuit form. Judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith decide which one will be crowned Festive Star Baker

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The proud residents of Springfield are outraged when they learn their town anthem was stolen from a travelling musician, so Bart and Lisa volunteer to find a replacement song. programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall: Unpacked
programme.desc: Steve and the crew encounter creatures both awe-inspiring and fear-inducing, including the worlds largest land predator. Plus, close encounters with nature itself in flooded caves of Mexico and on sheer cliffs of Oman

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall: Unpacked
programme.desc: The story of the world-class teams behind five expeditions. From the remote Arctic wilderness to flooded caves of Mexico their expertise are key

programme.title: Lost Land of the Volcano
programme.desc: Scientists and wildlife film-makers led by Steve Backshall, George McGavin and Gordon Buchanan explore Mount Bosavi, a giant extinct volcano covered by thick and largely unexplored rainforest in New Guinea. With the help of trackers from a remote tribe, they search for rare creatures and species to find evidence that may help stop the areas trees being felled for timber. The nest of the worlds smallest parrot, an unusual beetle and new types of frog, gecko and bat are among the teams first discoveries

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos rail voyage continues through Connecticut heading north through the scenic New England states. In New Haven, a crash course in rowing takes place on a stretch of water where college teams from Yale and Harvard have battled for victory since 1852. Making tracks north to Vermont, Michael experiences 19th-century rural farm life, when its green pastures made it the butter capital of the world

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: In Montreal, Michael Portillo discovers how French and British colonial roots have influenced the citys construction, cuisine and culture. Undaunted by his guidebooks description of the treacherous Lachine Rapids, the one-time MP gets a thorough soaking on a white-knuckle boat ride down the St. Lawrence River. In the Canadian capital, Ottawa, Michael visits the countrys parliament to hear about the birth of the new nation after Confederation in 1867. And at Ottawas historic Central Experimental Farm, Michael hears of the pioneering discoveries, which launched a Canadian wheat boom

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: A woman raises her six-year-old daughter to believe that Santa Claus does not exist, but they both have a change of heart after meeting a department store Father Christmas who claims to be the man himself. When the kindly fellow is accused of being a charlatan, his new friends engage a lawyer to prove his true identity. Remake of the 1947 family drama, with Richard Attenborough, Elizabeth Perkins, Mara Wilson and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: First Knight
programme.desc: A wandering swordsman is knighted for his fighting prowess at the court of King Arthur and his wife, Lady Guinevere. However, the new knight and the queen develop a dangerous and secret attraction for each other, while a neighbouring warlord threatens the downfall of the kingdom. Adventure, starring Richard Gere, Sean Connery, Julia Ormond and Ben Cross

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: A principled working-class woman and a selfish wealthy man meet the day they graduate from university, beginning a friendship that becomes a pivotal part of their lives. The changes they go through over the next 20 years are shown through the anniversaries of the day they first met. Romantic drama based on David Nicholls book, with Anne Hathaway and Jim Sturgess

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: The wisecracking anti-hero meets Russell, a gifted youngster living in an orphanage but being pursued by a heavily armed cyborg from the future known as Cable. The mercenary soon joins forces with Bedlam, Shatterstar, Domino and other powerful mutants to protect young Russell from villainous Cable and his advanced weaponry. Futuristic action comedy, co-written, co-produced by and starring Ryan Reynolds, with Josh Brolin, Julian Dennison and Zazie Beetz

programme.title: Good Boys
programme.desc: Three lads skip school and embark on an epic journey while carrying stolen drugs. They are hunted by teenage girls, and attempt to make their way home in time for a long-awaited party. Director Gene Stupnitskys comedy, starring Jacob Tremblay, Keith L Williams and Brady Noon

programme.title: Moneyboys
programme.desc: A male sex worker - or moneyboy - must juggle the demands of his family, while keeping how he supports them a secret. Writer/director CB Yis drama, starring Kai Ko and Chloe Maayan. In Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: LumoTV:: Deaf Funny
programme.desc: Lumotv: Deaf Funny

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: A couple whose daughter was born deaf and mute decide to enrol her in a special class in the hope that she might learn to speak. The difficulties they face in raising their child expose the tensions within their marriage. Drama based on the novel The Day Is Ours by Hilda Lewis, starring Phyllis Calvert, Jack Hawkins, Mandy Miller and Terence Morgan

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: A cavalry officer has to avoid showing preferential treatment when the son he has not seen for 15 years is posted to his fort as a cadet. His estranged wife also turns up wanting to take the boy away, but he is forced to put duty before his family when called on to rescue children kidnapped by Apaches on the Mexican border. John Fords Western, with John Wayne, Maureen OHara, Ben Johnson and J Carrol Naish

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: When works of art start disappearing, stolen by a master thief, Father Brown attempts to catch the culprit and save his soul. Comedy drama, starring Alec Guinness, Joan Greenwood and Peter Finch

programme.title: The Colditz Story
programme.desc: A medieval castle in Germany is turned into a PoW camp during the Second World War, and used to house the most rebellious Allied prisoners, all of whom have made repeated escape attempts. Although breaking out is supposedly impossible, the determined inmates refuse to be beaten and continue their bid for freedom. Second World War drama, starring John Mills and Eric Portman

programme.title: Starman
programme.desc: An alien who crash-lands on Earth falls in love with a widow after assuming her dead husbands identity as a cover, but the duo are soon fleeing the authorities in a frantic effort to reach an extraterrestrial rescue ship. Sci-fi fantasy romance, directed by John Carpenter and starring Jeff Bridges, Karen Allen, Charles Martin Smith, Richard Jaeckel and Robert Phalen

programme.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: Catherine Kya Clark is a young woman who fends for herself in the Deep South. Chase Andrews courts her in opposition to his mother, but when he is found dead, the finger of suspicion points at Kya, so lawyer Tom Milton mounts a robust defence. Drama adapted from Delia Owens bestseller, starring Daisy Edgar-Jones, David Strathairn and Taylor John Smith

programme.title: How I Live Now
programme.desc: An American teenager is sent to stay with relatives in rural Britain, and falls in love with a local boy. Reports start to come in of conflict erupting in Europe, and as events escalate into a Third World War, she finds herself a fugitive living in a dangerous military police state. Thriller based on Meg Rosoffs novel, starring Saoirse Ronan and Tom Holland

programme.title: Petite Maman
programme.desc: Following the death of her beloved grandmother, eight-year-old Nelly accompanies her parents to her mothers childhood home. As Nelly explores the house and nearby woods, she is immediately drawn to a neighbour her own age building a treehouse. Fantasy drama, starring Josephine Sanz and Gabrielle Sanz. In French with English subtitles

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh returns a wanted man to an army camp, but the commanding officer refuses to hand over his reward. Classic Western drama, starring Steve McQueen as a bounty hunter

programme.title: Waterloo
programme.desc: Napoleon returns from exile on Elba and regains control of the French army in a bid to reclaim his empire and depose the king. Meanwhile, the Duke of Wellington marshals the allied forces for the fateful battle to come and the day that will change the course of history. Drama, with Rod Steiger, Christopher Plummer, Orson Welles, Jack Hawkins, Dan OHerlihy, Michael Wilding and Virginia McKenna

Drama, with Rod Steiger, Christopher Plummer, Orson Welles, Jack Hawkins, Dan OHerlihy, Michael Wilding and Virginia McKenna

programme.title: Away All Boats
programme.desc: A Merchant Navy captain accepts a demotion so he can serve in the Second World War, and ends up a lieutenant on board a transport ship. The harsh methods employed by the captain to whip his crew into shape lead to tension between them, which gives way to mutual respect as they fight through the dangers of the Pacific campaign. Drama, starring Jeff Chandler and George Nader

programme.title: Death of a Gunfighter
programme.desc: A frontier marshal kills a drunken man in self defence, but finds his uncompromising brand of justice is no longer condoned by the locals. When he refuses to step down, the town fathers realise they may have to use violent methods of their own to rid themselves of him. Western, starring Richard Widmark, Lena Horne, Carroll OConnor and David Opatoshu

programme.title: Backlash
programme.desc: A man searches for the lone survivor of an Indian ambush which claimed the life of his estranged father, but his quest is complicated by the involvement of various interested parties trying to get their hands on a cache of stolen gold. Western, starring Richard Widmark, Donna Reed and John McIntyre

programme.title: Hombre
programme.desc: A white man raised by Apaches joins a stagecoach on a journey across the Arizona desert, but is treated with scorn by his fellow passengers because of his background. However, when they are attacked by bandits, he is the first to stand up and defend the people who hate him. Western, starring Paul Newman, Richard Boone, Fredric March, Diane Cilento and Cameron Mitchell

programme.title: Kiss of the Dragon
programme.desc: A Chinese police officer travels to Paris in search of the head of an international drug ring. However, his target is a corrupt cop who promptly frames him for murder. Fighting to clear his name, he finds an unlikely ally in an American prostitute who offers to testify against the crooked detective in return for help in rescuing her daughter. Martial arts adventure, starring Jet Li and Bridget Fonda

programme.desc: Harriet Walter (Law and Order: UK) joins the cast as the costume drama returns. programme.desc: Mary begins to emerge from her grief, and takes an interest in the running of the estate. However, her ambitions meet firm resistance from her father. programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: Morse meets his intellectual match when a serial killer haunting the streets of Oxford keeps himself one step ahead of the law and leaves cryptic messages to goad the police. At first glance, it seems to be the work of a deranged lunatic, but the elaborate staging of the crimes suggests method in the madness - and a macabre sharing of the sleuths passion for opera. Starring Shaun Evans, with Roger Allam, Anton Lesser, Sean Rigby and James Bradshaw

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

However, their president Patrick Morgan says the rare species could never have been seen so far away from its native Uganda and brands him a cheat. The next day, Barnaby and Jones have a murder case on their hands when Patrick is found dead at the scene of the reported sighting. Guest starring Paul Nicholls and James Dreyfus

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detective investigates the discovery of an unidentified teenage boys body in a coastal towns shipyard, who is revealed to be listed as a missing person, having absconded from the care of his support worker. Vera discovers that the quiet community where he was found is plagued by a serious drugs problem - despite the fact that the only known dealer in the area has turned his back on crime. The victim could be the answer to the mystery, but a wall of silence surrounds his death. Mark Addy guest stars

Meanwhile, Dave is challenged in the witness box at the Morgan murder trial over his handling of supergrass witnesses. Drama, starring David Tennant

programme.title: The Royal

programme.title: Heartbeat

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A father is aghast to read tales of wild romance in his teenage daughters diary, failing to realise they are all fictitious. Nostalgic drama, starring David Lonsdale and Tricia Penrose

programme.desc: When Bentham DeQuetteville falls to his death from a roof after seeing a headless horseman, his aristocratic family seem more concerned about their forthcoming Civil War re-enactment than the incident. Drama, starring Neil Dudgeon and Jason Hughes, with James Callis, William Gaunt and Raquel Cassidy

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: As Gary Bell waits for news about whether he will be offered a reprieve, Geordie and Phil discover a reason to arrest Eddie Jones, a violent husband who beats his wife. However, when Sidney arrives at the station the following morning, he finds Geordie with his knuckles bruised and Eddie dead on a stretcher. Chief Inspector Benson questions his innocence, and although the vicar leaps to his friends defence, no one can verify his whereabouts when Eddie was killed. At the vicarage, a remark about Mrs Maguires love life and the accidental loss of some sentimental postcards leave the housekeeper and Leonard feeling raw and misunderstood

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: When Sidneys old friend Reverend Sam Milburn visits the parish claiming to be seeking forgiveness for his crimes, the vicar is torn. Matters complicate further when Harding Redmond finds out he has returned and makes threats against his life, and Sam flees. With his friend now missing, Sidney fears the worst and must once again join forces with Geordie to investigate. Meanwhile, Leonard continues to wrestle with his feelings for Daniel Marlowe, and a visit from Mrs Maguire leads to Amanda having a heart-to-heart with Guy

However, they face tough competition from the twisted Sheriff of Nottingham. Director Otto Bathurst, who also worked on Peaky Blinders and His Dark Materials, delivers his take on the classic adventure yarn. Taron Egerton plays the heroic outlaw, with Jamie Foxx, Ben Mendelsohn and Tim Minchin also starring

programme.title: Edge of the World
programme.desc: Adventure telling the story of the Rajah of Sarawak, James Brooke, an inspiration for the Rudyard Kipling story The Man Who Would Be King and Joseph Conrads novel Lord Jim. Brooke defied the British Empire to rule a jungle kingdom in 1840s Borneo, embarking on a lifelong crusade to end piracy, slavery and head-hunting. Starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Josie Ho, Dominic Monaghan and Ralph Ineson

programme.title: Johnny Handsome
programme.desc: A badly disfigured ex-convict undergoes appearance-changing plastic surgery and sets out for revenge on the former accomplices who left him at the mercy of the police. Crime drama, starring Mickey Rourke, Ellen Barkin, Forest Whitaker, Lance Henriksen and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: Scars of Dracula
programme.desc: A concerned Carpathian student risks life and limb to rescue his neer-do-well brother from the vampire counts lair - but makes the mistake of taking his girlfriend with him. Hammer horror, starring Christopher Lee, Dennis Waterman, Jenny Hanley, Patrick Troughton and Anouska Hempel

programme.title: Martian Land
programme.desc: In the distant future, humans are living on Mars in cities that resemble those once found on Earth, and are protected from the inhospitable Martian atmosphere by dome-like force-fields. When a massive sandstorm breaks through the dome and destroys Mars New York, those in Mars Los Angeles must figure out how to stop the storm before it wipes them out next. Sci-fi drama, starring Alan Pietruszewski, Jennifer Dorogi and Lane Townsend

Drama, starring Robert Wagner, Terry Moore, Broderick Crawford and Buddy Ebsen

programme.title: Legend Lowdown

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: A crooked police officer tries to kill Alex after he receives insider information about a ring of Dallas lawmen stealing confiscated drugs. Chuck Norris and Larry Sellers star

programme.desc: A US Navy cruiser delivers the atomic weapons that will eventually be used at Hiroshima and Nagasaki to their destination, only to be sunk on the return journey. The surviving crew members are left stranded in the Philippine Sea for five days, enduring starvation and constant shark attacks. Fact-based Second World War drama, starring Nicolas Cage and Tom Sizemore

Vigilante thriller, starring Charles Bronson, Hope Lange and Vincent Gardenia

programme.title: Red

After tracking the youths down, Avery demands the parents take action against the youths but after being turned away, he decides to dish out justice by any means necessary. Thriller, starring Brian Cox, Noel Fisher, Tom Sizemore and Kyle Gallner

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jacqui Lockhart has worked hard all her life, and now that she has the savings available she wants to fulfil her lifelong dream of owning a holiday home on Spains southern Costa Blanca. programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Noiw approaching retirement, Wirral couple Catherine and Paul have their hearts set on a holiday home to enjoy with their families on the Costa Adeje in Tenerife. Laura Hamilton lines up five fantastic properties within their budget of £150,000 for them to consider

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

Jean Johansson lines up five potential properties for their budget of £200,000, but will any of them seem the perfect place?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: This competition comes from in and around Newcastle, where first up is 25-year-old barista Delphinium, whos eager to prove that vegetarians can win with her travel-inspired menu. The guests shes hoping to impress this week are 64-year-old financial advisor David, art teacher Karen, development manager Mark and 34-year-old mobile hairdresser Deborah. Its an unusual evening complete with strange food, shocking name reveals and dessert taking an unexpected turn

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is the second night of the competition in and around Newcastle, and art teacher Karens turn to host. Shes looking to impress her guests with a ginger-themed menu. Fussy eater Debs is unexcited at the prospect of goats cheese or salmon en croute and is more concerned whether Karen has made her own pastry, and while vegetarian Delphinium is underwhelmed by Karens menu, she really gets stuck into Karens art class entertainment. Software salesman Mark winds Debs up about 64-year-old ladies man David, who likes to shock the group with his antics in Ibiza

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Newcastle, mobile hairdresser and amateur musical songstress Debbie plans to bring showbiz razzle dazzle to her night. Humble pie from Mark shocks Karen, and there are very unusual dumplings for barista Delph and Ibiza-loving David to try

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the fourth day in and around Newcastle, Ibiza-loving 64-year-old David plans an elaborate Ibizan-style menu of tapas and paella. However, the menu is all a bit much for Mark, and theres still the issue of Karens bruised leg and bruised ego to deal with

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final night from in and around Newcastle, and the turn of Essex boy Mark to impress his new Geordie chums with a menu of deep fried brie, slow-cooked lamb and a passion fruit pavlova. programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The fourth and final venue is glamping site Evenlode Grounds in the Cotswolds, owned by Howard and Amanda Wooliams, who impress their guests by revealing it is also a working farm

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.desc: Royal Marine captain Jons life changed for ever when he stepped onto a land mine in Afghanistan and lost three limbs. programme.title: Operation Dark Phone: Murder by Text

Remarkably, the vehicle has somehow remained in an extraordinary state of preservation, tired but virtually unchanged since it left the army. programme.title: Micro Monsters with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough shifts the focus to bugs that prefer co-operation rather than conflict. They include burrowing cockroaches, the suitably named social spiders - which share a 30-metre web - the queen bee and her happy hive of workers and green ants pulling together to build a nest

programme.title: Micro Monsters with David Attenborough
programme.desc: The broadcaster concludes his close-up examination of the creepy-crawly world, shifting focus to the bugs ultimate invention - the colony. Key residents of these minuscule mega-cities include honey bees, termites, leafcutter ants - who have a knack for farming - and their Argentine cousins, members of a community so vast it spans an entire continent

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: The naturalist examines what the next few decades may hold for this remarkable ecosystem, and looks at the work of scientists who are trying to preserve the area and the species that inhabit it, assisted by research vessel the Alucia. He also embarks on an ambitious attempt to dive further into the reef than ever before to witness the resilient coral that live down in the depths and see if they hold answers that may help to overcome challenges that lie ahead, as the impact of humans on the reef continues to take its toll

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
