programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry and Simon head to Pembrokeshire to meet mechanic James, whose family have a stack of sheds crammed with classic cars, motorbikes and tractors, including a 1928 Model A Ford

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon OBrien visit two sisters at their south Wales workshop, where their restorations and upcycles include a Gothic-style organ and a half-size snooker table

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon OBrien are in Norfolk to meet upcycler and bike enthusiast Simon. The items they uncover include a filing cabinet, a trunk and a classic bicycle

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Jacqui Joseph sees what she can find at High Wycombe recycling centre in Buckinghamshire, choosing three items before they hit the skip. She rescues a wardrobe, some hardwood shelves and a bundle of woollen blankets and, with the help of newcomer Sarah Parmenter and carpenter Carwyn Owen, the tired trio of items have the chance to shine once more

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Sarah Moore presents the show from Keynsham recycling centre, finding new uses for a kidney-shaped dressing table, Victorian floorboards and some terracotta plant pots

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Jay Blades and the team bring four treasured family heirlooms back to life. The first arrival at the barn is Eloise McKenna from Kent, who hopes a large alabaster light shade that belongs to her sister can be repaired by art conservator Lucia Scalisi. Leather expert Suzie Fletcher takes a look at an old piano stool, which has been handed down through four generations of a family. Finally, experts Richard Biggs and Dominic Chinea turn their attention to restoring a toy bus and a pair of binoculars

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Jay Blades and the team bring four treasured family heirlooms back to life. The first arrival is Suzanne from London, who hopes that mechanical expert Steve Fletcher can bring a decorative wind-up bird cage that once belonged to her late mother back to its former glory. Church wardens Brian Tidswell and David Dickinson bring in a selection of carved angels for wood restorer Will Kirk to repair. Finally, an old Georgian peat bucket and a surgeons leather case are restored by experts Dominic Chinea and Suzie Fletcher

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: A tiny but treasured bicycle is in desperate need of Dominics expertise in metalwork. Meanwhile, silversmith Brenton attempts to save a historic cross.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus Ashworth travels to the small village of Boynton to clear out a collection of vintage telephones, and helps a family sort through 50 years of clutter

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus helps a roofer-turned-artist sell his sculptures for a small fortune. Plus, a woman is auctioning off her inherited clock collection.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus helps two grieving families. Satellite-themed cup-holders and a huge gold ring do well, but a haul of hard rock albums gets everyone spinning

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus Ashworth is asked to help with an emotional house clearance in Stockton-on-Tees, and is invited to examine the work of two semi-professional artists

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Sisters Lauren and Claire bring Timmy the teddy bear into the barn with hopes that toy restorers Amanda Middleditch and Julie Tatchell can bring back his sparkle. Having been given to their late father Brian when he was born in the 1960s, the sisters want to give the toy to his grandson Harrison to keep his memory alive. Sukeshi brings in a watch given to her by her mother that symbolises her fight for her daughter to lead an independent life despite her disabilities. Horologist Steve Fletcher teams up with Kirsten Ramsay to try get the watch ticking again. The final visitors to the barn, Kegham and his daughter Karine, bring in a sporting trophy for the attention of silversmith Brenton West. Now aged 97, Kegham won the trophy in the 1950s when he was a part of a tennis club in Cyprus

programme.title: The Repair Shop

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Comedian Chris Ramsey researches his family tree, starting by investigating his great grandfather who fought in the First World War. A trip to the military base in Dorset where he trained, reveals he fought at Gallipoli, one of the deadliest campaigns of the conflict. Tracing back to the late 18th century, Chris revisits the era when his five-times great grandmother was pregnant. This was a time when those lucky enough to pass a rigorous interview and then win a lottery were able to give birth at the British Lying-In Hospital, thus helping ensure their children got a better start in life. Narrated by Phil Davis

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Actress Lesley Manville researches her family tree. So far as her mothers side is concerned, by delving deep into Brightons local archives, Lesley uncovers a complex story of wartime separation, adultery and the inaccessibility of divorce. Tracing back her fathers line sees Lesley trying to solve what happened to her ancestor Aaron Harding. A widower with a large family to feed, Aaron protested poor conditions and pay as an agricultural worker in 1830 - a protest that would become known as the Swing Riots. He was arrested and subsequently transported to Australia

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall ,Nicky Campbell and the team help 67-year-old Christine Rose yo search for the sisters she was separated from at the age of four when her mother was prosecuted for neglect. The three young girls were taken by social services during the night and sent to separate childrens homes. Nicky leads the search for Christines sisters and the team makes remarkable discoveries, revealing layers of family that she never knew existed

programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell follow three stories of sons coming to terms with the past, including Marc Wolfes struggle to form a bond with his birth mother Esther, who lives in New Zealand. However, his search for identity didnt end there as researchers were able to reunite him with his birth father David, and the pair have grown close. One significant hurdle remained in the form of introducing David to his adoptive father Terry, and cameras were there as Marc introduces his two dads to each other

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell return to tell incredible stories of people desperate to find missing family and answer questions that have haunted entire lives. This week features two stories of children searching for their birth mothers after life-changing events - former Scotland footballer Dominic Matteo, who started to search after suffering a life-threatening brain tumour, and a woman, pained with emotion on her wedding day because her birth mother was missing

programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how woodlice play an important role in the environment. They find out that they are very adaptable and can live in lots of damp and dark places. programme.title: At Your Service
programme.desc: For years Henry Hunt and Lorraine Casey have dreamed of making much-needed improvements to the Smugglers Inn, which has been in Henrys family for generations, but despite commissioning extensive and expensive plans over the years they have never been able to realise their ambitions. Time and money are issues, while the couple also have to care for their baby daughter. Theyre exhausted and badly need the Brennans advice to find a better work-life balance and to make their dream of a modern, fit-for-purpose business come true.

programme.desc: The Rio Grande river cuts deep canyons between the US and Mexico, a vast wonderland of serene beauty and larger-than-life desert landscapes. It is also home to some of Americas most glorious wildlife. Big Bend National Park boasts more species of birds, butterflies, bats, reptiles, cacti, ants and scorpions than any other US heritage site

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: The crew at Tower, on the River Thames in London, is the busiest of all the lifeboat stations, averaging more than 500 shouts a year and aiming to launch to any emergency in under 90 seconds. When a call comes in about a man in the water near the Thames Barrier, they reach him with just moments to spare. In Fleetwood, on the Lancashire coast, a desperate 999 call alerts the crew to a bait digger - out looking for worms on the sand flats - who has been caught out by the incoming spring tide and is in danger of being submerged and swept out to sea

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon travels across the Kalahari desert in southern Africa, one of the continents last great unspoilt wildernesses. He begins his journey in a small village in Namibias Nyae Nyae conservancy, where he sets out on a hunt for wildebeest with San trackers, who still live in the traditional way. After weeks of dusty travel, Simon ends his journey in the Okavango Delta, where seasonal rains turn the desert in to a vast oasis of greenery

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7

As the lion pride continues to grow, becoming the largest in Africa, competition for food leads to chaos and infighting. Could this prides success also be it downfall?

They included Adolf Eichmann, who arranged the transportation of millions of Europes Jewish people to death camps, and Nazi secret police chief Klaus Barbie, who became known as the Butcher of Lyon because of his reputation for extreme cruelty. programme.desc: An eccentric stranger arrives in town and bewitches the children with his magic, but he appears to have something else up his sleeve. Drama, starring Derek Jacobi

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.sub-title: Santa Claus and the Tenth Avenue Kid
programme.desc: While working as a department store Santa Claus, a convict out on parole tries to help a troubled boy

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: After being fired from his job at an art museum, Lyle Endicott comes up with a plan to take advantage of a trusting invalid whom he befriended

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: The life and work of British director J Lee Thompson, whose films include Yield to the Night, Ice Cold in Alex, Cape Fear and The Guns of Navarone

programme.title: Andre Rieu
programme.desc: The Dutch violinist performs for the first time in Bucharest and reveals the secrets behind his open-air concerts, from the construction of the stage to singing with the audience

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Two would-be burglars enlist the help of a professional villain, but things do not turn out as planned. Starring Harry H Corbett and Fulton Mackay

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A police constable is used as bait to catch a murderer. Drama, starring Susan Penhaligon and Tim Woodward

programme.title: Dickens: Phantoms and Fictions
programme.desc: David Harewood explores Charles Dickens supernatural tales, delving into his eerie and atmospheric worlds through actor readings and archive footage, and looking at the popularity of ghost stories during the Victorian era

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.sub-title: Melvin Odoom, Max Beesley, Emily Atack
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan invites nine artists to paint celebrity sitters Melvin Odoom, Max Beesley and Emily Atack as Tai Shan Schierenberg, Kathleen Soriano and Kate Bryan judge the efforts

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: A look at the life and career of Rob Reiner, whose films include This Is Spinal Tap, Stand by Me, Misery, When Harry Met Sally and the Oscar-nominated A Few Good Men

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: A look at the life and career of the American actor, who starred in Cry Freedom, Malcolm X and The Hurricane, and won Oscars for his roles in Glory and Training Day

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A man falls in love with his ex-wife, but his heartless current spouse will do anything to make divorce difficult. Starring Peter Egan, Jennie Linden and Suzanne Danielle

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A middle-aged woman finds her husband is looking for a young mistress. Drama, starring Sheila Gish

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A worker is fired from his job and shoots his boss dead, but when he returns to the office the man is still alive and has no recollection of the incident

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: Gangster Sam Dunleavy sets up an elaborate alibi so that he can kill his ex-girlfriend Goldie, who left him for another man

programme.title: Andre Rieu: Love Is All Around
programme.desc: The violinist and his Johann Strauss Orchestra perform in his home town of Maastricht, playing a repertoire that spans classical, operatic and popular music

programme.title: Andre Rieu: Live in Malta
programme.desc: The violinist and his Johann Strauss Orchestra perform at the Granaries in Floriana, featuring a mix of romantic and lively music, including waltzes

programme.title: Brian and Roger Eno Live at the Acropolis
programme.desc: The brothers first live performance together, featuring tracks from their album Mixing Colours, as well as Rogers The Turning Year and Brians Foreverandevernomore

programme.title: Fanny: The Other Mendelssohn
programme.desc: Documentary about one of the unsung heroines of classical music, with several of her greatest works often misattributed to her celebrated brother Felix. The film explores sexism in the music worlds of both 1840s and the present day and features recordings of her work by Isata Kanneh-Mason

programme.title: Up Late with Nicola Benedetti
programme.desc: The first of two concerts recorded at the Edinburgh International Festival Hub, with the violin virtuoso joined by Orquesta la Pasion, Schola Cantorum de Venezuela, sarod player Soumik Datta, the Leonore Piano Trio and mezzo Sarah Connolly

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming visits Liverpool, cutting through cliches about football and the Beatles to explore its less-celebrated treasures. Among his destinations are a 1930s banking building that has remained unaltered since closing in 2007, a well-appointed set of toilets and a recording studio hidden in a bar. He also discovers which former dictator once spent Christmas in the city

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming discovers more little-known facts on a journey between Smithfields and Spitalfields, two of Londons most famous markets. He begins with a fry-up breakfast before visiting the remains of a Roman amphitheatre and investigating a mysterious secret in a Liverpool Street hotel, as well as meeting former EastEnders star Larry Lamb (Archie Mitchell)

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming explores Newcastle, discovering strange sounds by the river and finding out how traditional culture is being reinterpreted in the Byker district. He goes behind the scenes at Newcastle United with local football hero Peter Beardsley, learns about the history of adult comic Viz from former editor Simon Donald and accompanies comedienne Sarah Millican to her favourite part of the city

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon Snow heads into the wildling camp to try to negotiate a peace with Mance Rayder, but an unexpected arrival changes the situation at the Wall, while Daenerys is forced to make a decision about the dragons in Meereen. Cersei demands that Tywin call off her engagement to Loras Tyrell, Bran learns more about his destiny, and Tyrion receives a visit from Jaime as he awaits his fate. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: At Castle Black, Jon Snow struggles to mediate between wildling leader Mance Rayder and Stannis Baratheon, while a mournful Cersei continues to worry about the future of her son Tommen in Kings Landing. Tyrion arrives in a new location and is presented with a fresh opportunity and Daenerys grapples with the politics of power in Meereen, as well as her tempestuous dragons. Starring Kit Harington, Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The House of Black and White
programme.desc: Arya arrives in Braavos, while Brienne and Pod run into trouble on the road, and Cersei fears for her daughters safety in Dorne as Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for her lover Oberyns death. Stannis has a proposal for Jon and an advisor tempts Daenerys. Fantasy drama, starring Maisie Williams, Lena Headey and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Queen Margaery spends time with her new husband King Tommen. Elsewhere, fugitive Tyrion and Varys walk the Long Bridge of Volantis, and in Braavos, Arya sees the Many-Faced God. Fantasy drama, starring Natalie Dormer and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The militant arm of the Faith of the Seven grows more aggressive, Jaime and Bronn head south and Ellaria and the Sand Snakes vow vengeance

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon enlists the help of an unexpected ally, Daenerys makes a difficult decision in Mereen, Brienne searches for Sansa, and Theon remains under Ramsays control

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Arya continues her training at the House of Black and White, Jorah and Tyrion run into slavers and the Sand Snakes mount an attack. Fantasy, starring Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon prepares for conflict, Sansa tries to talk to Theon, and Brienne waits for a sign. Elsewhere, Jaime attempts to reconnect with his family

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Arya makes progress in her training, Sansa confronts an old friend, Cersei faces a struggle and Jon embarks on a journey. Fantasy drama, starring Lena Headey

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Westeros, Jon returns to the Wall from his controversial ranging mission, and Stannis faces a difficult decision. Meanwhile, in Braavos, Arya runs into a familiar face and Mace Tyrell visits the Iron Bank, and against her better judgement Daenerys hosts a traditional Meereenese celebration of athleticism. Fantasy drama, starring Kit Harington, Stephen Dillane, Maisie Williams and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The High Sparrow and his militant followers appear to have made an indelible mark on Kings Landing as Cersei finds herself seeking forgiveness. Meanwhile, in the North, Stannis embarks on a gruelling march, and Jon is challenged, and across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys is surrounded by strangers as the fifth chapter of the hit fantasy drama draws to a close. Starring Kit Harington, Emilia Clarke, Lena Headey and Stephen Dillane

programme.title: True Detective
programme.desc: In the town of Ennis, Alaska, the eight men working at the Tsalal Arctic Research Station all disappear. Local police chief Liz Danvers leads the investigation, but state trooper Evangeline Navarro believes it may be linked to an unsolved murder. The return of the crime anthology, starring Jodie Foster and Kali Reis

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Having been reassigned to harbour patrol, McNulty discovers a corpse in the water and pays back Rawls for his demotion by proving City Homicide is responsible for the investigation. Major Valchek feels slighted by local union boss Frank Sobotka, while Stringer loses his drug supplier. Back at the docks, Port Authority officer Beadie Russell uncovers a grisly scene in a shipping container

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: While Kendall, Shiv and Roman consider an aggressive move regarding the Matsson deal, Connor tries to make the most of his wedding rehearsal dinner

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Sophie finally realises her father is partly to blame for many of her problems, and begins to assert herself more

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Christopher and Tony Blundetto reflect on their painful memories as they dispose of a corpse, Janice takes anger management classes after attacking a mother at a soccer game, and the conflict between Tony and Johnny Sack intensifies

programme.title: It: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: After joining Leroy at their new house in Derry, Charlotte is left with a strange feeling while running errands in town, and Will is teased on his first day of school. Later, Lilly faces pressure from all sides about what really happened at the cinema and Ronnie worries about her fathers fate

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Hood and Carrie go to Chinatown to secure weapons from a dealer named Fat Al, before becoming involved in a titanic gun battle with the Ukrainian mob as they try to take down Mr Rabbit in the New York church. Meanwhile, Emmett and his wife leave town, but the white supremacists track them down and Proctor sees a different side to Rebecca. Drama, with Antony Starr

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor returns to explore more of the worlds most luxurious hotels and begins in Miamis South Beach, home to some of the most hedonistic and extravagant establishments in America. At the Fontainebleau, he meets a man with eye-opening stories about Frank Sinatras regular visits and gets a shock when he discovers how much it costs to hire a booth in the night club. Richard also gatecrashes swimwear fashion week at the Raleigh Hotel, where he speaks to the event manager about the many celebrity parties he has organised

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: In this edition the actor explores the luxury hotels of Hong Kong. Home to more skyscrapers than any other city, he first checks in to the Mandarin in the financial district, before experiencing the Four Seasons, the only hotel with two Michelin three-star resturants, as well as the timeless Peninsula in Kowloon, which even provides a Rolls-Royce airport taxi service. He ends his stay at the Ritz-Carlton, home to the worlds highest swimming pool

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming explores Newcastle, discovering strange sounds by the river and finding out how traditional culture is being reinterpreted in the Byker district. He goes behind the scenes at Newcastle United with local football hero Peter Beardsley, learns about the history of adult comic Viz from former editor Simon Donald and accompanies comedienne Sarah Millican to her favourite part of the city

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Lord and Lady Fitzalan Howard, the owners of Carlton Towers near Selby in North Yorkshire, prepare to host a fitness boot camp weekend at their property - while also welcoming an array of guests to celebrate their sons birthday. Meanwhile, Sir Benjamin Slade hopes a murder mystery weekend at Maunsel House in Somerset will help pay off a sizeable electricity bill

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: While butting heads with Simca over the cookbook, Julia takes inspiration from an exceptional meal. Avis escorts Russ to an eye-opening dinner party, while Judith clashes with Blanche, and Alice faces mounting pressure from the network.. Return of the drama, starring Sarah Lancashire and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: Disagreeing on several recipes, Julia and Simca suggest a culinary showdown for guests including James Beard at Hunters birthday, while newcomer Elaine undergoes scrutiny from her co-workers

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Georgia Rae Mahoney makes more enemies in the homicide squad, and pushes one of them too far. Dr Cox recounts an odd story

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Part one of two. Ballard and Gharty investigate when a priest is stabbed to death in his own rectory, but allegations of sexual abuse complicate the case

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: An old foe returns to the great game, and Arya faces a difficult choice. Meanwhile, Gilly is given a chance to discover whether Lord Randyll Tarly lives up to his formidable reputation as she meets Sams family, and Jaime puts himself at odds with the Faith Militant as he faces off with the High Sparrow. Fantasy drama, starring Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, John Bradley, Hannah Murray and Maisie Williams

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: Unable to forgive Ninos betrayal, Elena takes Dede and Elsa to stay in Milan with Mariarosa and Franco, but following a tragic event, Elena gives in and moves into Ninos place in Via Petrarca. In Italian

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: Avis bonds with a prominent existentialist, while Julia turns to her friends at Le Cordon Bleu for help. As WGBH experiences a shake-up, Alice goes through a trial of her own

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: Julia is at odds with her new director and Aviss new beau after she returns to Boston, while a run-in with a former colleague finds her fielding questions from the FBI

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Part two of two. Another priest is murdered after the two Guatemalan political refugees suspected of killing the first one are set free

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A man is discovered to have been buried alive, leaving Pembleton and Bayliss investigating a murder. Meanwhile, Munch and Kellerman examine a horrific car crash that was apparently no accident. Richard Belzer stars

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: What Is Dead May Never Die
programme.desc: Tyrion strengthens his position as Hand of the King with a risky gambit devised to identify the member of the small council in league with his sister Cersei, while at Winterfell, Maester Luwin tries to help Bran make sense of his dreams. Catelyn travels to the Stormlands to foster an alliance with the Baratheons, but King Renly, his new wife Margaery Tyrell and her brother Ser Loras have other plans. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robb Starks chain of victories against the Lannisters enrages Joffrey, who punishes Sansa for her brothers successes. Tyrion struggles to find a way to curb his nephews cruel excesses and enlists Cerseis lover Lancel as an informant. Catelyn urges the Baratheon brothers to forgo their ambitions and unite against a common enemy, while across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys and her exhausted retinue arrive at the walled city of Qarth

programme.title: It: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: After joining Leroy at their new house in Derry, Charlotte is left with a strange feeling while running errands in town, and Will is teased on his first day of school. Later, Lilly faces pressure from all sides about what really happened at the cinema and Ronnie worries about her fathers fate

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: A tragedy throws Ralphs investigation into disarray. Meanwhile, a girl claims to be visited by a strange man at night. Starring Ben Mendelsohn

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony books into the Plaza Hotel for a little peace and quiet, but his dreams are haunted by faces from the past. Meanwhile, Johnny Sacks bid for power claims another casualty, and Tony Blundetto resolves to exact revenge. Annette Bening guest stars, and the episode features appearances from former stars of the show, including Annabella Sciorra and Joe Pantoliano

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: The return of the drama about an ex-con who assumes the identity of a dead man and takes his job as a small towns sheriff. Hood, Brock and Siobhan go after Hondor as they attempt to avengs Emmetts death, while Chayton returns and he and his men attack a US Marine weapons convoy near a local military base. With Antony Starr

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robb Starks chain of victories against the Lannisters enrages Joffrey, who punishes Sansa for her brothers successes. Tyrion struggles to find a way to curb his nephews cruel excesses and enlists Cerseis lover Lancel as an informant. Catelyn urges the Baratheon brothers to forgo their ambitions and unite against a common enemy, while across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys and her exhausted retinue arrive at the walled city of Qarth

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Catelyn is forced to flee when the Baratheon brothers rivalry comes to a bloody end, and Lord Baelish spots an opportunity to further his own ambitions. Tyrion discovers Joffrey is planning to use a secret weapon to defend his seat of power, and Theon sails for the Stony Shore to prove his worth as a Greyjoy. Arya receives a favour from the man she freed from Harrenhal, and the Nights Watch arrives at the Fist of the First Men to stem the advance of the wildling army

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Old Gods and the New
programme.desc: King Joffreys tyrannical rule prompts the people of Kings Landing to riot, with near devastating consequences for Sansa. Meanwhile, beyond the Wall, Qhorin gives Jon a chance to prove himself. and across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys resolve strengthens as she vows to reclaim what she believes is rightfully hers. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Blood For Dust
programme.desc: A travelling salesman drowning under the weight of providing for his family finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague. Action thriller, starring Scoot McNairy, Kit Harington, Josh Lucas and Ethan Suplee

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: A hard-boiled cavalry scout with a feral dog as companion stumbles across a woman and her child stranded on their homestead deep inside hostile territory. Despite repeated attacks by the Apaches, they refuse to leave their home, leaving the scout with no choice but to stay and defend her. Western, starring John Wayne, Geraldine Page, Ward Bond and Michael Pate

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Daredevil explorers Rick and Evelyn OConnell are called into action when their son accidentally resurrects the evil Chinese Emperor Han from his ancient tomb. The family now faces a race against time to prevent the merciless leader from awakening his vast terracotta army in a plot to take over the world. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Maria Bello, Jet Li and Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: The underwater kingdom of Atlantis is ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a huge army at his command, he plans to conquer the oceanic people before taking on the rest of the world. Arthur Curry, Orms half-brother and the human-raised heir to Atlantis, embarks on a globetrotting quest to stop him. But a ruthless mercenary is on his trail, seeking revenge. Superhero adventure, starring Jason Momoa, Nicole Kidman and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: A youngster called Chan Lok-kwan accidentally enters the Walled City, discovers the order amidst its chaos, and learns important life lessons along the way. Chinese crime thriller with subtitles, starring Raymond Lam, Louis Koo and Sammo Hung

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: A storm-chaser and her estranged husband are brought together in a joint project to monitor the path of an oncoming tornado - but the pair face a race against the clock as a rival government-backed group with hi-tech resources tries to beat them to it. Action thriller, starring Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: After losing his home, Lucius, the son of a slain Roman General, is forced to enter the Colosseum in an attempt to bring glory back to Rome. Ridley Scotts historical drama sequel, starring Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal and Denzel Washington, with Connie Nielsen and Derek Jacobi reprising their roles from the first film

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: DArtagnan faces a race against time to rescue his kidnapped sweetheart, the queens seamstress and confidante Constance. The young womans survival may rest with Milady, compelling DArtagnan to forge an uneasy alliance with his former enemy. Meanwhile, King Louis XIII faces the prospect of civil war, fuelled by conspirators within his royal court. Swashbuckling sequel, starring François Civil, Eva Green and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: DArtagnan faces a race against time to rescue his kidnapped sweetheart, the queens seamstress and confidante Constance. The young womans survival may rest with Milady, compelling DArtagnan to forge an uneasy alliance with his former enemy. Meanwhile, King Louis XIII faces the prospect of civil war, fuelled by conspirators within his royal court. Swashbuckling sequel, starring François Civil, Eva Green and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: A battle-hardened special forces operative attempts to rescue his kidnapped niece when a mercenary mission spirals into chaos. Action thriller, starring Eden Brolin, Andy Garcia and Melissa Leo

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A thwarted Nazi experiment lands the Allies with an unexpected visitor from another dimension in the form of a bright-red demon. A secretive US government agency fosters the little devil and he grows up to be its crucial weapon against the forces of darkness - but the re-emergence of the sinister wizard Rasputin proves a challenge even for him. Action fantasy based on the comic-book series, with Ron Perlman, John Hurt, Selma Blair and Karel Roden.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: After losing his home, Lucius, the son of a slain Roman General, is forced to enter the Colosseum in an attempt to bring glory back to Rome. Ridley Scotts historical drama sequel, starring Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal and Denzel Washington, with Connie Nielsen and Derek Jacobi reprising their roles from the first film

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Conservationist Sergei Kravinoffs complex relationship with his ruthless father, Nikolai, sets him on a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become Kraven, the worlds most feared hunter. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Russell Crowe and Ariana Debose

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett search for a $100million heroin consignment brazenly stolen by a French drug kingpin from the police evidence room. However, after a mix-up over a phone call from a potential witness, each cop has to assume the others identity - Lowrey becoming the henpecked family man and Burnett the playboy. Michael Bays action thriller, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Tea Leoni, Tcheky Karyo and Theresa Randle

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: A Trojan prince elopes with the king of Spartas wife, sparking a bitter and bloody war between a mighty alliance of Greek kings and the city of Troy, whose champion engages in intense personal conflict with the enemys most formidable warrior. Wolfgang Petersens adventure, inspired by Homers epic poem The Iliad, with Brad Pitt, Eric Bana, Orlando Bloom, Brian Cox, Sean Bean and Peter OToole

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The bandana-wearing one-man army has turned his back on violence to live a quiet life in Thailand. But before long he takes up arms once again to rescue a party of missionaries who have been taken captive en route to Burma by a sadistic military officer. Action sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Julie Benz and Graham McTavish

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: Mr Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: A super-intelligent talking dog invents a time machine and adopts a human boy to assist with his experiments. The curious youngster cannot resist meddling with the invention - with disastrous results - and the duo have to journey into the past to undo the damage done to the course of history. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ty Burrell and Max Charles

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest, leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato, Julia Roberts, Rainn Wilson and Joe Manganiello

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A tribe of perpetually happy fuzzy-headed creatures are kidnapped by a race of giants who intend to eat them. The princess of the clan escapes and plans a rescue mission - but to save her friends, she will need the help of a grumpy troll with a loathing of music who has rejected their joyful culture to live as a loner. Animated musical, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: A tap-dancing penguin goes searching for his missing son, but his search leads him to discover a drifting iceberg that threatens to destroy his colony. He sets out to unite all the birds in the Antarctic to avert the catastrophe. Animated musical comedy sequel, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Ava Acres and Hank Azaria

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: A mischievous deer tempts Boog, a domesticated grizzly bear with no survival skills, to try life on the wild side. However, with the hunting season in full swing, all the fearful woodland creatures urge Boog to unleash his inner ferocity and drive the gunmen out of the forest. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Martin Lawrence, Ashton Kutcher, Gary Sinise and Billy Connolly

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: Scarygirl
programme.desc: When her world is shrouded in darkness, a young girl must travel to the mysterious city of light to save her father from a lethal scientist and prevent her planets destruction. Animated fantasy adventure, featuring the voices of Anna Torv, Sam Neill and Tim Minchin

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: An alien on the run from his own people arrives on Earth and embarks on an adventure with a daring young woman. It turns out to be a life-changing trip during which they begin to understand the true meaning of the word home. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Shenxiu was abandoned by her mother when she was a child. Since then, she has bad dreams about a monster called Nightmare. One day, she travels on a cruise ship with her family. On a stormy night, she falls and breaks into the fancy Deep Sea restaurant. She meets the Chef, Nanhe, and embarks on a mysterious journey. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Brian Flaccus and Angela Malhotra

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Young Angelo dreams of becoming an explorer and a zoologist. When he goes to visit his granny, his parents leave him behind at a rest stop, and he decides to cut through the forest in search of them. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Kristen McGuire

programme.title: The Inseparables
programme.desc: A puppet and an abandoned stuffed animal toy cross paths in Central Park and pair up for an epic adventure in New York City. Animated adventure, with the voices of Monica Young and Danny Fehsenfeld

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: A tap-dancing penguin goes searching for his missing son, but his search leads him to discover a drifting iceberg that threatens to destroy his colony. He sets out to unite all the birds in the Antarctic to avert the catastrophe. Animated musical comedy sequel, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Ava Acres and Hank Azaria

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: Anxiety-crippled mallard Mack spins nightmarish bedtime stories to educate his children, Dax and Gwen, about the perils of straying from the comfort of Moose Head Pond. Eventually Mack organises a spontaneous family migration south from leafy New England to Jamaica, accompanied by curmudgeonly uncle Dan. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Kumail Nanjiani, Elizabeth Banks, Danny DeVito and Carol Kane

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: A mischievous deer tempts Boog, a domesticated grizzly bear with no survival skills, to try life on the wild side. However, with the hunting season in full swing, all the fearful woodland creatures urge Boog to unleash his inner ferocity and drive the gunmen out of the forest. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Martin Lawrence, Ashton Kutcher, Gary Sinise and Billy Connolly

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Magical beings from folklore, including Santa Claus, Jack Frost and the Easter Bunny, join forces to defeat the plans of an evil spirit, who intends to steal the dreams of children and use the power they grant him to dominate the world. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chris Pine, Alec Baldwin, Hugh Jackman, Isla Fisher and Jude Law

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail obsessed with motor racing gets sucked into a cars exhaust pipe, and emerges having gained super-speed. This stroke of luck allows him to realise his dream of competing against human drivers in the prestigious Indianapolis 500 race. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Open Season 2
programme.desc: Wild dog Mr Weenie is kidnapped by a gang of family pets, who intend to brainwash him into returning to domesticated life, and his friends must make a perilous journey into human territory to save him. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Joel McHale, Jane Krakowski, Mike Epps, Billy Connolly and Crispin Glover

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Young Angelo dreams of becoming an explorer and a zoologist. When he goes to visit his granny, his parents leave him behind at a rest stop, and he decides to cut through the forest in search of them. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Kristen McGuire

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure with Scientists!
programme.desc: The bungling leader of a band of inept buccaneers is determined to prove his worth to his rivals and win the coveted Pirate of the Year award. An encounter with the naturalist Charles Darwin gives him the chance to pull off a daring crime - if he can survive coming face to face with the pirate-hating Queen Victoria. Animated comedy, with the voices of Hugh Grant, Martin Freeman, Imelda Staunton and David Tennant

programme.title: The Inseparables
programme.desc: A puppet and an abandoned stuffed animal toy cross paths in Central Park and pair up for an epic adventure in New York City. Animated adventure, with the voices of Monica Young and Danny Fehsenfeld

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureaus publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An overweight high-school student is madly in love with his best friend, but their feelings are far from mutual. Years later, having slimmed down and become a successful music executive, he resolves to put an end to his unrequited love and finally win her over. Romantic comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Amy Smart, Anna Faris and Chris Klein

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A smooth-talking chauffeur employs his natural charm to enjoy a string of casual liaisons with a host of women - but as he tires of his bed-hopping antics, he struggles to work out what is missing from his life. Comedy drama remake, starring Jude Law, Sienna Miller, Susan Sarandon and Marisa Tomei

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: A Cappella group the Barden Bellas enjoy an unprecedented run of success, until a disastrous performance sees them banned from national competitions and beset by scandal. They attempt to turn their fortunes around and redeem their reputation by competing in the World Championships of A Cappella in Copenhagen. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her sons science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Hugh Grant, Leo Woodall and Colin Firth

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-movie star tries to win the heart of an aspiring actress as the introduction of sound changes the film business for ever. However, his frequent on-screen love interest does not take kindly to this real-life romance. Musical comedy, starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald OConnor, Jean Hagen and Millard Mitchell. Songs include Make em Laugh, You Are My Lucky Star and the title number

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: Divorced couple Jane and Jake are reunited at their sons college graduation after 10 years apart, and end up sleeping together. Despite Jakes marriage to a younger woman and Janes fledgling romance with a kindly architect, the pair end up having a clandestine affair. Romantic comedy, starring Meryl Streep, Alec Baldwin and Steve Martin

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A vet working at a Hawaiian zoo falls madly in love with a beautiful woman and pulls out all the stops to romance her. However, his attempts to woo her are seriously undermined by the fact that she suffers from short-term memory loss, meaning he has to resume his courtship from scratch every day. Romantic comedy, starring Drew Barrymore, Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: An American householder is dismayed when his plans for a traditional festive family holiday are thrown into complete disarray by a succession of annoying neighbours and long-lost relatives, who turn up on his doorstep offering their own brand of Christmas cheer. Comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Beverly DAngelo, Randy Quaid, Diane Ladd, Juliette Lewis, Miriam Flynn, Johnny Galecki and William Hickey

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl wishes she could skip the misery of growing up and become an adult overnight. However, the next day she wakes up to find 17 years have mysteriously passed and she is now a successful magazine editor approaching her 30th birthday - and her new life is just as hard to cope with as her old one. Romantic comedy, starring Jennifer Garner, Mark Ruffalo, Christa B Allen and Andy Serkis

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A hard-working businessman gets his hands on a remote control that enables him to manipulate all aspects of his life - including fast-forwarding through the bits he would rather miss. However, the device takes on a mind of its own and starts causing him to skip entire years. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Christopher Walken and Kate Beckinsale

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Thirtysomething slacker Dupree finds himself out of a job with nowhere to live, and turns to his newly married best friend Carl for a place to stay. But Carl comes to regret his act of hospitality as the layabout shows no sign of ever moving out - not to mention his annoyance when his new wife takes a liking to their laid-back guest. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Kate Hudson and Michael Douglas.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-movie star tries to win the heart of an aspiring actress as the introduction of sound changes the film business for ever. However, his frequent on-screen love interest does not take kindly to this real-life romance. Musical comedy, starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald OConnor, Jean Hagen and Millard Mitchell. Songs include Make em Laugh, You Are My Lucky Star and the title number

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas (an all-female a cappella singing group) reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour. However, they face a squad who uses both instruments and voices. Final part of the blockbusting comedy trilogy, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Fast-talking Detroit cop Axel Foley heads for Los Angeles after an old friend is murdered before his eyes. His search for the killers leads him into conflict with a seemingly untouchable drug kingpin, but he also has to contend with the local force, who do not want him taking matters into his own hands. Comedy thriller, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Ronny Cox, John Ashton and Steven Berkoff

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two desk-bound incompetent cops live in the shadow of their more daring colleagues. However, when the heroes of the station are killed in a bizarre accident, the bumbling duo get the chance to prove their worth as they stumble across a tycoons illegal activities. Action comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Steve Coogan and Eva Mendes

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: An Eastern European en route to America is stranded at JFK Airport when a coup in his native country leaves him in a diplomatic no-mans land. His nation ceases to exist, meaning he can neither return home nor set foot on the streets of New York. Stuck indefinitely inside the terminal, he sets out to make some sort of a life for himself. Steven Spielbergs comedy, with Tom Hanks, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Stanley Tucci and Chi McBride

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A smooth-talking chauffeur employs his natural charm to enjoy a string of casual liaisons with a host of women - but as he tires of his bed-hopping antics, he struggles to work out what is missing from his life. Comedy drama remake, starring Jude Law, Sienna Miller, Susan Sarandon and Marisa Tomei

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: Divorced couple Jane and Jake are reunited at their sons college graduation after 10 years apart, and end up sleeping together. Despite Jakes marriage to a younger woman and Janes fledgling romance with a kindly architect, the pair end up having a clandestine affair. Romantic comedy, starring Meryl Streep, Alec Baldwin and Steve Martin

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The cast of a cancelled sci-fi series are reduced to a life of conventions and public appearances, only to find themselves genuinely transported into space. Naive aliens have mistaken the show for real life and want the actors to help defend them from an evil extraterrestrial warlord. Sci-fi comedy, starring Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman and Sam Rockwell

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: A baseball player is stunned to learn he has come into a massive inheritance. Unfortunately, there is one condition - he must somehow find a way to spend $30million in just one month, or he will lose the lot. Meanwhile, two scheming lawyers, who stand to get the money if he fails, are determined to sabotage his efforts. Comedy, starring Richard Pryor, John Candy, Lonette McKee and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The cast of a cancelled sci-fi series are reduced to a life of conventions and public appearances, only to find themselves genuinely transported into space. Naive aliens have mistaken the show for real life and want the actors to help defend them from an evil extraterrestrial warlord. Sci-fi comedy, starring Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman and Sam Rockwell

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Cinema List
programme.desc: Fancy a career change? This week, the Cinema List goes hunting for jobs with these film names as a guide. From The Mechanic to The Accountant, dust off your CV with these hardworking hits.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The hapless fool is employed as a security guard for a British art gallery and is sent to Los Angeles to bring back a famous painting. Unfortunately, he finds himself mistaken for a renowned art professor and invited to make an important presentation. Mel Smiths British comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Burt Reynolds, Peter MacNicol, John Mills, Peter Capaldi and June Brown

programme.title: Nobodys Fool
programme.desc: Ageing rebel Sully has spent a lifetime avoiding responsibility. When Sully is reunited with his estranged son, he learns he is a grandfather, forcing him to reassess his attitudes and driving him to get to know his family before it is too late. Comedy drama, starring Paul Newman, Dylan Walsh, Bruce Willis and Melanie Griffith

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: A Liverpudlian housewife is trapped in a humdrum existence and a dull marriage. Fed up, she decides to go on an unheard-of holiday by herself to a Greek island, where she starts to enjoy life again - especially when she is romanced and seduced by a smooth-talking fisherman. Comedy, adapted from Willy Russells stage play, starring Pauline Collins, Tom Conti, Bernard Hill, Julia McKenzie and Alison Steadman

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A cockney lothario leads a charmed life, enjoying casual sex with as many women as possible with no thought of the consequences. However, a series of unexpected setbacks forces him to finally take stock of his life. Comedy drama based on the play by Bill Naughton, starring Michael Caine, Jane Asher, Millicent Martin, Shirley Anne Field, Shelley Winters and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A fertility expert pioneers a treatment enabling men to become pregnant and carry babies to full term. When the authorities cancel funding for the research, he decides to test it on himself, but gives little thought to how difficult it will be to keep it a secret. The situation is further complicated when he starts to fall for the woman whose child he is carrying. Comedy, with Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Emma Thompson and Frank Langella

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A second-rate ice-hockey player with a thuggish temperament discovers he has a powerful golf swing. He decides to enter a prestigious tournament to raise enough money to save his debt-ridden grandmothers house from falling into the hands of tax inspectors. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Carl Weathers, Julie Bowen and Frances Bay

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The hapless fool is employed as a security guard for a British art gallery and is sent to Los Angeles to bring back a famous painting. Unfortunately, he finds himself mistaken for a renowned art professor and invited to make an important presentation. Mel Smiths British comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Burt Reynolds, Peter MacNicol, John Mills, Peter Capaldi and June Brown

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Two criminal brothers discover the orphanage where they were raised faces closure unless the nuns who run it can pay their tax bill, so the pair embark on an urgent mission to revive their old blues band to raise the money needed. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Aretha Franklin, James Brown, Ray Charles, Cab Calloway, Carrie Fisher, John Candy and John Lee Hooker

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Two billionaire brothers engineer the downfall of a high-flying stockbroker, while giving a homeless conman all the advantages of wealth, as part of a bet to see whether heredity or upbringing determines character. Comedy, starring Dan Aykroyd, Eddie Murphy, Jamie Lee Curtis, Ralph Bellamy, Don Ameche and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film

programme.title: 48 Hrs
programme.desc: A hard-bitten cop goes on the trail of two escaped fugitives who killed several of his fellow officers. He needs someone with inside knowledge of the criminals, and is reluctantly forced to temporarily release a fast-talking thief from prison to help him in his investigation. Comedy thriller, starring Nick Nolte, Eddie Murphy and Annette OToole

programme.title: Christmas on Duty
programme.desc: Former army rivals Blair and Josh must work Christmas duty together. When a snowstorm threatens holiday deliveries to the base, theyre forced to cooperate to save Christmas, despite their past conflicts. Romantic drama, starring Janel Parrish and Parker Young

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her sons science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Hugh Grant, Leo Woodall and Colin Firth

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Inside a rural farmhouse, painter Ramona Harris recuperates with a leg brace following a head-on car collision that claimed the life of her husband. Out of the blue, a woman in funereal garb materialises in a chair on the front lawn of the fixer-upper, and she has no intention of leaving. Psychological horror, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Peyton Jackson and Estella Kahiha

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When a spy is suspected of treason, her husband faces the ultimate test - loyalty to his marriage or his country. Director Steven Soderberghs thriller, starring Michael Fassbender, Cate Blanchett and Rege-Jean Page

programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: A science teachers life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town. Sci-fi comedy drama, starring Brandon Routh, Mena Suvari and Malina Pauli Weissman

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderberghs horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: Two buddies sneak into a party on New Years Eve 1999, but the night turns even crazier as the clock hits midnight. Director Kyle Mooneys teen horror comedy, starring Jaeden Martell, Rachel Zegler and Julian Dennison

programme.title: Lake George
programme.desc: Two misfits embark on a road trip, take a dubious deal and find redemption amid shady circumstances. Crime thriller, starring Carrie Coon and Shea Wingham

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: A strangers claim that a couples 15-year-old daughter was switched at birth throws their perfect family into turmoil, unearthing shattering secrets. Drama, starring Sophia Bush, Chris Carmack and Amiah Miller

programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: A group of college friends reunites for a hiking trip in Sweden. When one of them is injured, they are forced to make a risky detour through a forest during a rainstorm, which leads them into the clutches of a menacing presence stalking the woods. Horror based on Adam Nevills novel, starring Rafe Spall and Robert James-Collier

programme.title: The Secret of Marrowbone
programme.desc: A young man and his three siblings have kept the death of their beloved mother secret in order to remain together. However, they are plagued by a sinister presence in their sprawling manor. Writer/director Sergio G Sanchezs horror, starring George MacKay, Anya Taylor-Joy and Charlie Heaton

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel

programme.title: Escape from the 21st Century
programme.desc: In 1999, after discovering they have the power to travel in time with every sneeze, three friends embark on an adventure to save the world. Fantasy adventure, starring Ruoyun Zhang and Elane Zhong. In Chinese and Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The discovery of an ancient relic leads the Ghostbusters old and new to join forces to stop a second ice age. Supernatural comedy adventure sequel, starring Paul Rudd, Carrie Coon, Mckenna Grace and Finn Wolfhard

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A man buys his pregnant wife a vintage doll, which places their lives in jeopardy. Members of a Satanic cult have their eyes on the antique toy, and break into their house to prepare a ritual that will transform the harmless plaything into a terrifying monster. Horror spin-off from The Conjuring, starring Annabelle Wallis and Ward Horton

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer attempts to destroy vampires in a small American town. Horror based on Stephen Kings novel of the same name, starring Lewis Pullman, Makenzie Leigh, Jordan Preston Carter and Alfre Woodard

programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: An android is sent to Earth by aliens on a diplomatic mission, and arrives in the middle of the the Jordanian Civil War of 1970. She forms a connection with a British reporter covering the conflict, and through him, hopes to learn to understand humanity. Sci-fi drama, starring Tilda Swinton and Bill Paterson

programme.title: Lisa Frankenstein
programme.desc: A misunderstood teen embarks on a murderous journey with a reanimated Victorian man to find love, happiness and body parts. Comedy horror written by Diablo Cody, starring Kathryn Newton and Cole Sprouse

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist attempts to save her career by turning to investigative podcasting. She soon starts to wonder if a strange artefact is linked to an alien conspiracy, or whether she is losing her mind. Director Matt Veselys thriller, starring Lily Sullivan

Horror spin-off from The Conjuring, starring Annabelle Wallis and Ward Horton

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An inexperienced military officer is sent to the front line in a war against an alien invasion, and dies within minutes. However, at the point of death, he is transported back in time to relive his last day again. As he faces the same battle over and over again, the experience he gains turns him into the ultimate warrior. Sci-fi adventure based on Hiroshi Sakurazakas novel All You Need Is Kill, starring Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Heart Eyes
programme.desc: When two co-workers survive a killer on Valentines Day, the two have to find out who it is. Comedy horror, starring Mason Gooding, Olivia Holt and Gigi Zumbado

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Lisa Frankenstein
programme.desc: A misunderstood teen embarks on a murderous journey with a reanimated Victorian man to find love, happiness and body parts. Comedy horror written by Diablo Cody, starring Kathryn Newton and Cole Sprouse

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family.
